title: BRIEF-Era Group Signs An Exclusive Maintenance And Repair Agreement With Pratt & Whitney Canada

organizations.name: brief-era group signs an exclusive maintenance and repair agreement with pratt & whitney canada
brief-era group signs an exclusive maintenance

text: 05 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Era Group Signs An Exclusive Maintenance And Repair Agreement With Pratt & Whitney Canada Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Era Group Inc: * ERA GROUP SIGNS AN EXCLUSIVE MAINTENANCE AND REPAIR AGREEMENT WITH PRATT & WHITNEY CANADA * ERA GROUP INC - ‍AGREEMENT COVERS 180 P&WC HELICOPTER ENGINES ACROSS ERA‘S GLOBAL FLEET Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
